locations.name: The Golden City
locations.description: A bustling metropolis known for its grand markets and towering spires. The streets are paved with yellow cobblestones that shimmer in the sunlight.
locations.history: Founded over 500 years ago by the legendary King Aldrich after the Great War. The city has served as the capital of the kingdom ever since.

locations.name: Dark Forest
locations.description: An ancient woodland filled with mystery and danger. The trees here grow unnaturally tall, blocking out most sunlight.
locations.history: Said to be cursed by an old witch centuries ago. Many who enter never return.

locations.name: Frostpeak Mountains
locations.description: Treacherous mountain range covered in eternal snow. Home to ancient dragons and hidden monasteries.
locations.history: The dwarven kingdoms once thrived here before the dragons came.

npcs.name: Eldrin the Wise
npcs.description: An elderly mage with vast knowledge of the arcane arts. His long white beard nearly touches the ground, and his eyes sparkle with ancient wisdom.

npcs.name: Thora Ironhammer
npcs.description: A stout dwarf with arms like tree trunks. She crafts the finest weapons in the realm.

npcs.name: The Witch of the Woods
npcs.description: A reclusive figure who lives deep in the forest. Some say she's helpful, others claim she's dangerous.

items.name: Sword of Dawn
items.description: A blade that glows with the light of the morning sun. Said to have been wielded by King Aldrich himself.

items.name: Amulet of Shadows
items.description: A dark pendant that grants its wearer the ability to move through shadows, but at a terrible cost.

events.name: The Festival of Lights
events.description: An annual celebration where the entire city is illuminated by thousands of lanterns. Musicians and performers fill the streets.

events.name: The Great Disappearance
events.description: An entire village near the Dark Forest vanished overnight. No trace of the inhabitants was ever found.
